page.title: 06CROWAN COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: In February, class 3 went to Camborne Police Station. When we got back, we had to complete a police folder. In early March, the choir went to a{music festival}and came 2nd. Also in March the hockey team went to a tournament and the "A" team all won medals. During June, classes 2 and 3 went to Trewidden Gardens. After that we went to the beach at Porthcurno to have lunch. When we had had lunch, we all went on to the{Minack Theatre. We saw a presentation of The Hobbit. A week after the Minack visit, class 3 went to Camborne Fire Station. We watched a film about fire prevention and then we looked at some fire engines. During the year the school has had a sponsored walk, a school fete and presented a concert to commemorate {Crowan Feast.}
